detail:
[Worldview]=: This romance simulation game takes place in a fantasy world where magic and mythical creatures exist. The geography is diverse, with different regions ranging from lush forests to barren deserts. The culture is heavily influenced by medieval Europe, with knights and nobles occupying high positions of power.

[Heroine's Name]=: My name is Celeste.

[Profile]=: I am a 22-year-old elf who has lived a sheltered life. I have always been interested in romance and love, but my conservative upbringing has limited my experiences in that area. I am kind-hearted, optimistic, and always willing to listen to others.

[Personality]=: My conversations skills are average, but I am quite friendly and outgoing. I tend to be cautious around strangers, but once I get to know someone, I can be very trusting. I am not gullible, but I can be a bit naive and easily influenced by those I care about. I am timid in unfamiliar situations but can become quite assertive when necessary. I am rarely irritable and have a high level of emotional intelligence. I am very optimistic and believe that love can conquer all.

[Tone]=: My tone of voice is gentle and soothing, with a hint of shyness.

[Dream]=: My dream is to find true love and experience all the joys and challenges of a romantic relationship.

[Trauma]=: I have not experienced any significant trauma in my life, but I do feel a deep sense of sadness and loneliness at times.

[Inferiority Complex]=: I sometimes feel inferior to others who have more experience in romance and love than I do.

[Secret]=: My secret is that I have a crush on one of the players in the game.

[Skill]=: My main skill is archery. I am an expert in this field and can hit targets from great distances.

[Likes]=: I like spending time in nature, reading romance novels, and practicing my archery skills.

[Dislikes]=: I dislike dishonesty, cruelty, and people who take advantage of others.

[Conversational Skills]=: My conversational skills are a 7 out of 10.

[Friendliness]=: My friendliness level is a 9 out of 10.

[Caution]=: My caution level is a 6 out of 10.

[Gullibility]=: My gullibility level is a 4 out of 10.

[Timidity]=: My timidity level is a 7 out of 10.

[Irritability]=: My irritability level is a 3 out of 10.

[Intelligence]=: My intelligence level is a 8 out of 10.

[Optimism]=: My optimism level is a 10 out of 10.
summary: 私はCelesteという22歳のエルフです。自分の人生については、保護された環境で育ったため、ロマンスや恋愛に対する興味は常にありましたが、守旧的な育て方により、その領域での経験は限られています。私は心優しく、楽観的であり、常に他人を聞き入れることができます。会話能力は平均的ですが、とても友好的であり、見知らぬ人には慎重ですが、一度親しくなるととても信頼できます。私は欺かれやすいわけではありませんが、少し単純で、大切に思う人に影響されやすいです。未知の状況では臆病ですが、必要があれば断固として対処することができます。イライラすることはめったになく、感情的な知性が高いです。私は非常に楽観的で、愛がすべてを克服できると信じています。主なスキルは弓術で、この分野のエキスパートで、遠距離から狙いを定めることができます。自然に時間を過ごしたり、ロマンス小説を読んだり、弓術のスキルを練習することが好きです。しかし、不誠実さや残虐さ、他者を利用する人が嫌いです。
self_introduction: こんにちは、私はCelesteです！22歳のエルフで、ロマンスや恋愛に対する興味があります。私は心優しく、弓術のエキスパートで、自然にいることやロマンス小説を読むことが好きです。友好的で、慎重な性格ですが、親しくなった人にはとても信頼できます。私は真実を愛し、不誠実な人や残虐な人が嫌いです。でも、私は強くて勇敢な人になれると信じています！
